creator: York Farmers Colonization Company (author)
description: At head of title: "A farm is the safest investment, 1884." Charts are of townships showing the names of settlers. Introduction refers to an earlier pamphlet, which may be York Farmers Colonization Company, History of the Company , [Toronto: s.n., 1883] (1 leaf, [7]-22p.), which also has a folded map.
